final1.subtests

Class RecommendationSubtest

  • java.lang.Object
    • test.InteractiveConsoleTest
      • final1.subtests.RecommendationSubtest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicCommandTest, EdgesCommandTest, ExportCommandTest, InvalidCommandLineArgumentsTest, InvalidInputFileTest, InvalidRecommendTerms, ValidInputFileTest, ValidNodesCommandTest, ValidRecommendCommandTest

    public abstract class RecommendationSubtest
extends InteractiveConsoleTest
    Base class for implementing subtest for the programming lecture's first final task. Contains some convenience methods and fields.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Joshua Gleitze, Martin Loeper

    • Method Detail

      • relation

        protected java.lang.String relation(int number,
                        int from,
                        int to)
        Parameters:
        number - Indicates which relation to use. number % 6 is assigned as followed:

        0 => contains,
        1 => contained-in,
        2 => successor-of,
        3 => predecessor-of,
        4 => has-part,
        5 => part-of

        from - An int between 0 and 26 indicating the element the relation comes from.
        to - An int between 0 and 26 indicating the element the relation comes goes to.
        Returns:
        A valid relation as described above.

      • reverse

        protected java.lang.String reverse(int number,
                       int from,
                       int to)
        Parameters:
        number - Indicates which relation to use. number % 6 is assigned as followed:

        1 => contains,
        0 => contained-in,
        3 => successor-of,
        2 => predecessor-of,
        5 => has-part,
        4 => part-of

        from - An int between 0 and 26 indicating the element the relation comes from.
        to - An int between 0 and 26 indicating the element the relation comes goes to.
        Returns:
        A valid relation as described above.

      • exitTest

        @Deprecated
protected void exitTest(java.lang.String command,
                       java.lang.String... args0)
        Deprecated. 
        Runs InteractiveConsoleTest.errorTest(String, String...) with the provided arguments and asserts that System.exit(x) was called with x > 0 afterwards.

        This method is deprecated as its function is now provided by InteractiveConsoleTest.setExpectedSystemStatus(test.SystemExitStatus)

        Parameters:
        command - The command to run on the console.
        args0 - The arguments for the main-method

      • exitTest

        @Deprecated
protected void exitTest(java.lang.String[] commands,
                       java.lang.String... args0)
        Deprecated. 
        Runs InteractiveConsoleTest.errorTest(String[], String...) with the provided arguments and asserts that System.exit(x) was called with x > 0 afterwards.

        This method is deprecated as its function is now provided by InteractiveConsoleTest.setExpectedSystemStatus(test.SystemExitStatus)

        Parameters:
        commands - The commands to run on the console
        args0 - The arguments for the main-method

      • consoleMessage

        protected java.lang.String consoleMessage(java.lang.String[] commands,
                              java.lang.String[] commandLineArguments)
        Description copied from class: InteractiveConsoleTest
        The message that should be printed at the start of an error message. Override this method to print your own message.
        Overrides:
        consoleMessage in class InteractiveConsoleTest
        Parameters:
        commands - the commands that were run on the interactive console
        commandLineArguments - the command line arguments the console was called with
        Returns:
        a String representing the session
